name: Weird Dimension Shenanigans
description:
A 2021 (01) Brackey Game Jam Entry

Suck enemies and get more weapons to defeat the Evul (Evil) Eye.

I regret making this game.

But really, it's just an excuse to try out pixel art, so I guess, it's somewhat of a success?

Credits:

Music by Eric Matyas

www.soundimage.org

Sound by sfxr & Eric Matyas
